name: The Immortal
description:
This is running game in 2D Platform, enemies will appear on the way, kill them all if you want to reach the end of the land, Lung Cu. You have to focus on the game 100%, just one hit of enemy everything will back to the beginning.

FEATURES
Auto Run: Our Hero will keep running until he reaches the end of land, Lung Cu.
There are 7 lands in total.


Charge Attack: He can attack enemies on the way by charge energy and release it.
Attack with Mouse, Space or Ctrl


Unlock Skin: Keep killing enemy will help you to unlock new skins and lands
There are 10 skins in total.
